ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clatp0cl.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( glb ` W ) = ( glb ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_p0val | |- ( W e. CLat -> .0. = ( ( glb ` W ) ` B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 6 | 1, 3 | #P_clatglbcl | |- ( ( W e. CLat /\ B C_ B ) -> ( ( glb ` W ) ` B ) e. B ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( W e. CLat -> ( ( glb ` W ) ` B ) e. B ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( W e. CLat -> .0. e. B ) |
